footer.cookie: OmniEdge uses cookies to enhance the user experience.

about.title-1: Simplifying the usage flow of product​
about.subtitle-1: While people talk about #nocode, we prefer to offer #noconf service to our customers. They deserved to have more time with their families.​ We found OmniEdge totally from Twitter, with a team from 6 countries, in the post-pandemic era, we embrace remote work to create painless, maintenance-less, secure, and affordable products.
about.subtitle-2: We are looking for talented people who are trying to help others to have a great work-life balance by creating great products while enjoying their own work-life balance. We are currently not hiring, but are happy to hear from talents. Send us an email [hi@omniedge.io](mailto:hi@omniedge.io) if you are interested in us.​

index.title: Private Network for Edge Computing, Hybrid Cloud, Industrial IoT, AR, VR, Remote access and more. What happens in intranet,stays in intranet.
index.description: OmniEdge reduces the enterprise connectivity deployment from weeks to minutes, helps customers focusing on their core business, connects and manages their devices from anywhere, anytime.
index.slogan-description: Omniedge's Peer-to-Peer and Zero-Config Layer 2 VPN solutions are not only a great and affordable network solution for a small team but also for big companies with thousands of computers all around the world. What happens in intranet, stayin in intranet.
index.getstart-subtitle: Start from free, no credit card required
index.name: Name
index.seotitle: OmniEdge | Unlimited Computers In Your Private Network With Zero Config

instructions.step: null

Android.captionText: Compatible with Android 6 or later mobile phone or TV.

description.title: Get started on Android Phone & TV

instructions.step: null

Linux-cli.captionText: Compatible with macOS,Arch,Ubuntu,CentOS, Debian,Fedora and more linux distribution

description.title: Get started on CLI for Linux and macOS

instructions.step: 1. [Sign up](https://omniedge.io/register) your account
2. Download and install OmniEdge CLI
3. Login By Password or secret key. You can generate secret-key on [Dashboard](https://omniedge.io/dashboard)
instructions.code:
omniedge login -u yourname@youremail.com 
 #or 
omniedge login -s securitykey

instructions.step: 4. Join your network. You will be prompted to choose from the available networks or specify network.
instructions.code:
sudo omniedge join 
 #or 
sudo omniedge join -n 'virtual-network-id'

instructions.step: 5. Wait a second and a secure VPN will be established
6.Follow instruction [Run OmniEde as a service](/docs/article/install/autostart-omniedge) to autostart OmniEdge
1. Sign up your account: https://omniedge.io/register

instructions.step: 4. Join your network. You will be prompted to choose from the available networks. You can also specify which network to join in the parameter.
instructions.code: sudo omniedge join or sudo omniedge join -n 'virtual-network-id'

instructions.step: 5. Wait a second and a secure VPN will be established

features.highsecurity-desc: P2P MESH networks, encrypted end-to-end by Two-fish, AES128 or ChaCha20 Ciphers, customized authentication and 2FA to achieve dual security confirmation of devices and users with GDPR in mind.
features.highspeed-desc: End-to-end direct connection, latency improved by up to 50%* compared to traditional VPN networks. Zero-config setup allows one click deployment.
features.highperformance-desc: Cross platform compatibility connecting the widest range of OS and IoT devices. Management of all users and equipment on one dashboard. Minimize setup time, resources, costs and maintenance, helping you focus on your business.
features.how-desc: We rebuild the intranet on the internet setup easier and so you can connect your devices in a secure way without
features.download-desc: We currently support various platforms. You can download them here.
features.login-desc-2: email login, security key login and Google login
features.create-desc: We already created a default virtual network for you. However, you can create your own virtual network in just a minute.
features.connectin-desc: Click connect button on our client application
features.comparedesc: No public IP. No port forwarding. Zero config. Zero firewall rules. We rebuild the intranet on the internet setup easier and so you can connect your devices in a secure way without concern at anywhere and anytime.
features.FeaturePage-subtitle: Makes secure connectivity from weeks to minutes
features.FeaturePage-desc: OmniEdge reduces the enterprise connectivity deployment from weeks to minutes, helps customers focusing on their core business, connects and manages their devices from anywhere, anytime.
features.crossplatform-desc: Users can run the product on different devices, whether the devices are on Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, Linux or routers, or on a variety of different public clouds.
features.dashboard-desc: Users can manage all registered devices on one dashboard, no matter where they are located, with an end-to-end private encrypted network, allowing users to access their own devices.
features.speed-desc: End-to-end direct connection, compared to traditional VPN networks, can improve response by 50%.
features.security-desc: P2P MESH networks, where packets interact directly between devices, use enterprise G-Suite and other authentication to achieve dual security confirmation of devices and users.
features.setup-desc: Set up OmniEdge just in minutes with our apps on any device, you can choose several different methods to activate your devices.
features.maintenanceless-desc: Forget about the labor-intensive system management job, with OMNIEDGE you can focus on your own core business.
features.flvn-desc: Virtual network becomes a virtual office connecting all remote devices by intranet for your team and trusted users only.
features.flrm-desc: Control a remote computer as if it’s located in front of you, by Remote Desktop Protocol, VNC or SSH.
features.flcr-desc: Connect multiple platforms, Windows,macOS, iOS, Android, Linux and more.
features.flsb-desc: Sub router allows you connect your devices which is not with Omniedge installed.
features.flbd-desc: Big-data transfer functionality allows international enterprises to exchange data between different sites across their global footprint.
features.flmu-desc: Organize your users to bring secure connection to enterprise's access and resources.
features.flsk-desc: Security Keys allow you connect your linux based devices with only a command line, turning your own devices into an industrial router.
features.flp2p-desc: Traffic over OmniEdge is end-to-end encrypted by Twofish/AES128/ChaCha20 cipers' P2P MESH network.
features.fliot-desc: Integrate OmniEdge into your own IoT project or hardware.
features.flzc-desc: No Public IP, No Port Forward,Zero Config, Zero Firewall Rules. All your connectivity in one single click.
features.flokta-desc: Integrate Okta as your SSO provider to use OmniEdge.
features.flapi-desc: Admin API for admin users to have access to the admin dashboard for overview virutal network, devices and network setting.
features.herosubtitle: We’re on a mission to provide reliable, secure, and painless connectivity solutions for anyone who wants to have access to their devices, anywhere, anytime.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help.

questions.question: How long does it take to set up OmniEdge?
questions.answer: OmniEdge can be set up in 5 minutes or less, by installing OmniEdge Apps for your devices on iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms.

questions.question: Is my privacy secure with OmniEdge?
questions.answer: We take privacy security very seriously. please read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy) for Details.

questions.question: How do I change my existing subscription plan?
questions.answer: If you already have an OmniEdge plan, please contact us to change your plan or your billing period, or you can do it by yourself at the dashboard.

questions.question: How do I change my Google Login password ?
questions.answer: You can reset your password by [forgot password](http://omniedge.io/forgot-password).

questions.question: When will I be billed?
questions.answer: Our plans are generally prepaid, so you pay for them in advance. Annual Enterprise plans can be invoiced with net 30 payment terms upon request.

questions.question: What payment methods do you offer?
questions.answer: We support payment by credit card through [Stripe](https://stripe.com). Customers with Enterprise plans can request payment by other methods, such as wire or ACH. At this time, we can only receive payment in US Dollars ($).

questions.question: Where are the term of service and privacy policy?
questions.answer: View the OmniEdge [Terms of Service](/terms) and [Privacy Policy](/privacy).

questions.question: How can I learn more about OmniEdge?
questions.answer: Learn more about OmniEdge by reading [documentation](/doc).
